title: War in Ukraine: reflections on the economic consequences for Russia
description: In this episode of the Sound of Economics Live Maria Demertzis and Guntram Wolff host Russian economist Sergei Guriev, to discuss how the war in Ukraine will affect the Russian economy.
itunes:summary: Sergei Guriev joins us to discuss how the Russian invasion of Ukraine will affect the economies of Russia and the world.
itunes:author: Bruegel
dc:creator: Bruegel
